metadata.name: OUTLANDER
metadata.description:
Outlander is a 30/30 Edition of a surreal night photograph I captured with the use of a drone.

Although this image looks unrealistic, This is actually a 32-second single exposure photograph I captured on my phone camera. The circle of light in this image is created with the help of a drone with lights mounted on it.

This image is created altogether in the camera without any CGI or Photoshop effects.

Title: Outlander 
Edition Size: 30/30  
Photographer: Pranav Sp  
Location: Alappuzha, Kerala, India

LICENCE: As long as the creator is credited, the primary NFT holder can use the NFT in advertising, to display privately and in groups, and to create virtual galleries, documentaries, and essays. Commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works are not permitted. Ownership of the intellectual property remains with the creator.
